sentence.Network_en: The rainy days always depress me.
I know he is too optimistic but I don't want to depress him.
sentence.Network_cn: 我知道他太过乐观了，但我不想令他灰心丧气。

sentence.Network_en: When you depress a key of an organ, a note is sounded.
sentence.Network_cn: 你压下一个风琴键, 就会听到一个音符响.

list.abs: 抑郁症（depression）是一种常见的精神疾病，有高患病率、高复发率、高致残率和高致死率等特点，被称为“第一心理杀手”。具体表 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... depressed a 感到压抑的 depression n 沮丧；萧条 express v 表达；特快.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French depresser, from late Latin depressare, frequentative of deprimere 'press down'

entry.def: If someone or something depresses you, they make you feel sad and disappointed.

example.ex: I must admit the state of the country depresses me...
example.tran: 我必须承认国家的现状让我倍感沮丧。

example.ex: I know he is too optimistic but I don't want to depress him.
example.tran: 我知道他太过乐观了，但我不想令他灰心丧气。

entry.def: If something depresses prices, wages, or figures, it causes them to become less.

example.ex: The stronger U.S. dollar depressed sales.
example.tran: 美元走强导致销售额下降。

sentences.sentence: "The bad state of her child's health demoralizes her"
"The glut of oil depressed gas prices"
"The lack of rain had depressed the water level in the reservoir"

means.word_mean: 5. lessen the activity or force of;

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ones that grow assets quickly tend to depress returns.

auth_sentence.content: Binny had never allowed her circumstances to depress her.
auth_sentence.res_content: Binny had never allowed her circumstances to depress her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Binny had never allowed her circumstances to depress her.

auth_sentence.content: Which could ignite our sense of competition or just depress us.
auth_sentence.res_content: Which could ignite our sense of competition or just depress us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Which could ignite our sense of competition or just depress us.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可压缩的, 可压榨的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compress[v.压缩]+ible能……的→adj.可压缩的, 可压榨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
stems_affixes.word_buile: depress[v.压制,压抑]+ed……的→adj.沮丧的,抑郁的;不景气的,萧条的
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人深刻印象的,感人的
stems_affixes.word_buile: impress印象,引人注目+ive……的→adj.给人深刻印象的,感人的
press挤压+ing……的→adj.急迫的
compress[v.压缩]+ion表名词→n.压缩,压紧,浓缩
depress[v.压制,压抑]+ion表名词→n.消沉;不景气萧条期
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
stems_affixes.word_buile: express表达,表示+ion→n.表达;表情;声调;腔调;榨出;措词;式;符号
impress印象,引人注目+ion表名词→n.印象,感想;盖印,压痕
oppress[v.压迫,压制]+ion表名词→n.压迫

stems_affixes.value_cn: 压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
stems_affixes.word_buile: press挤压+ure表名词→n.压,压力,压迫,强制,紧迫,困苦,困难
suppress[v.镇压,压制]+ion表名词→n.镇压,压制
press挤压→n.&n.&v.压, 按
com一起+press压→一起压→压缩
de向下+press压→向下压→压制→情绪低下
ex出+press挤压→把[思想]挤出来→表达
im进+press挤压→压进去→盖印→印入头脑→留下印象
op加强动作+press挤压→拼命压→压迫
re回+press挤压→压回去
sup下+press压→压下去

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去"等; 2. 表示"使……成为,加强"等

stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+struct结构+ion表名词→弄坏结构→破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 定义,解释;[轮廓影像等的]清晰度;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: de使……成为,加强+fin界限+ition表名词→划出界限→定义
de使……成为+sign标志→使……成为标志→设计
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+celer速度+ate表动词→使速度变慢
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+code密码→去掉密码
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+fame名声→名声变坏→诽谤
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+forest森林→去掉森林
de去掉+lete→v.删除;擦掉
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+mobilize动员→反过来动员→复员

stems_affixes.value_cn: 剥夺……的国籍;解除国有化
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+nationalize国有化→v. 剥夺……的国籍;解除国有化
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+press压→向下压→压制
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+salt盐→去掉盐分
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+throne皇冠→去掉皇冠→退位
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+train火车→v.下火车
de去掉,变坏,离开,变慢,向下,分开,去+value价值→去掉价值
de使……成为,加强+limit限定→加强限定
de使……成为,加强+line线条+ate表动词→划线条→描画[轮廓]
de使……成为,加强+nude裸体的→成为裸体
de使……成为,加强+pict描画→成为画图→描绘
de使……成为,加强+sicc干+ate表动词→弄干
de使……成为+sign标志→使……成为标志→设计

Sentence.sentence: It is sometimes a bit depressing.
People who struggle with excessive Internet use maybe depressed or have other mood disorders, Orzack said
Feeling empty, depressed or irritable when not at the computer.
After the Soviet Union's collapse, says Cherlin, "anxiety for the future" depressed birthrates in Russia and Eastern Europe.
It is sometimes a bit depressing.

means.word_mean: 压下; 推下; 拉下

sentences.en: The little girl depressed the button.
His mother was depressed by the sad news.
sentences.cn: 这个坏消息使他的母亲意志消沉。

sentences.en: A rise in oil prices depresses the car market.
sentences.cn: 石油价格的上涨使汽车市场不景气。

jushi.english: His defeat in the last cross-country race depressed him.
jushi.chinese: 他在上一次越野赛中的失败使他感到沮丧。

jushi.english: He depressed the keys of the piano with all of his feeling.
jushi.chinese: 他带着所有的情感按下琴键。

jushi.english: When the business is depressed, there is usually an increase in unemployment.
jushi.chinese: 当商业萧条时,通常失业就会增加。
